check_revolute_leg.description: Check the revolute leg of the scissors by rotating it on its joint.

clean_revolute_leg.description: Clean the revolute leg of the scissors.

rotate_leg.description: Rotate the leg of the scissors by swinging it on its joint.

clean_fixed_leg.description: Clean the fixed leg of the scissors to remove dust or any other particles.

inspect_scissors.description: Inspect both legs of the scissors for any dirt or debris and clean them.

clean_whole_scissors.description: Wipe the revolute leg, then clean the fixed leg of the scissors to ensure they are clean.
